name: Reebee
headline: Flyer app.
description:
Reebee is the best way to browse and distribute flyers. 

The reebee mobile application makes it easy for customers to browse and discover local flyers, stay organized with an integrated shopping list, search products and much more. 

Available for free in Canada on the Apple App Store, Google Play, and BlackBerry World. 

Reebee specializes in targeted flyer distribution, engaging the consumer audience through a rich mobile experience.

Digital distribution not only fills in the voids of physical distribution, but it also reaches a new audience with distinctly measurable results. Track consumer buying signals like never before.

founders.name: Tobiasz Dankiewicz
founders.description: Co-founded reebee in 2012, exited in 2022. Interested in building marketplaces and technologies that improve peoples lives.

# Shop smarter with Flipp and save 20% weekly on groceries.
**Type your postal code** below to see the latest deals near you.
[Start Saving](http://reebee.com/<https:/flipp.com/en-ca/flyers?postal_code=>)
Please enter a valid postal code.
Save at over 2,000 of your **favourite stores.**
Flipp is your one-stop marketplace for savings and deals. Browse weekly digital flyers from retailers near you, or search for the items you need.
For the best mobile experience and to browse products on-the-go, download the [Flipp app](http://reebee.com/<https:/app.flipp.com>) today. Available on the App Store, Google Play, and Huawei AppGallery.

[Browse Flyers](http://reebee.com/<https:/flipp.com/flyers>)

Add coupons directly to your **loyalty cards.**
With Flipp, there’s no need to carry around all your loyalty cards. Simply add your cards to the Flipp app and clip your coupons digitally to save in-store.
Download the [Flipp App](http://reebee.com/<https:/app.flipp.com>) to find and clip coupons on-the-go.

[Browse Coupons](http://reebee.com/<https:/flipp.com/coupons>)
Stay organized with your **digital Shopping List.**
Add deals or your own items directly to your shopping list, and Flipp will instantly find the best deals for you. Download the [Flipp App](http://reebee.com/<https:/app.flipp.com>) to keep your list handy while you shop.

generated_description:
**Reebee Overview**

Reebee is a Canadian company based in Kitchener, specializing in targeted digital flyer distribution through its mobile app. Initially launched with the promise of being “the best way to browse and distribute flyers,” Reebee has evolved into a rich platform that enhances the shopping experience.

**Mission and Offerings**

The backbone of Reebee’s offering is its app, which enables users to easily browse local flyers, stay organized with an integrated shopping list, and search for products. Think of it as your digital guide for navigating the world of shopping flyers and savings. With Reebee, you not only find deals, but you can also track consumer buying signals in a way that traditional physical flyers simply can't match. This digital shift expands the reach of flyer distribution while providing measurable results for users and businesses alike.

**Accessibility and Availability**

Reebee’s app is available for free on major platforms including the Apple App Store, Google Play, and BlackBerry World, making it accessible to a wide array of users across Canada. As consumers increasingly turn to their mobile devices for shopping, Reebee stands as a modern solution for deal-seekers.

**Team and Background**

Founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator’s S13 batch, Reebee operates with a nimble team of 11 employees. Their innovative approach to digital distribution allows them to tap into the potential audience that traditional flyers miss out on.

In the competitive marketplace of shopping apps, Reebee focuses on creating an engaging mobile experience that not only serves consumers but also assists retailers in reaching their target audience effectively.

**Conclusion**

Whether you're a bargain hunter or someone looking to streamline your shopping list, Reebee has the tools to help you save time and money. Their focus on digital innovation is not just a reaction to current trends but a strategic move towards a more connected shopping experience. For more information, visit [Reebee’s website](http://reebee.com).
